option1.title: Buy
option1.header: Steps to Successfully Buying Your Home
option1.description: The process of buying real estate can vary depending on your location, the specific property and your individual circumstances.

step1.title: Consultation
step1.description: Understand the client's needs and budget.

option2.title: Sell
option2.header: Steps to Successfully Selling Your Home
option2.description: The process of selling real estate can vary depending on your location, the specific property and your individual circumstances.

step1.title: Listing Consultation
step1.description: Discuss the client's goals and set a competitive listing price.

step2.title: Marketing Strategy
step2.description: Develop a marketing plan to attract potential buyers.

step3.title: Showings and Open Houses
step3.description: Arrange property viewings and open houses to showcase the home.

step4.title: Negotiate Offers
step4.description: Assist in negotiating offers and terms with potential buyers.

step5.title: Closing Management
step5.description: Guide the client through the closing process and ensure a smooth transaction.
